items.title: Veiled Whisper of Love - A love poem
items.summary:
‚ù£Ô∏è
In Shadows Cast, She holds her breath,
Bound to love, She fights with death.
In doubts, she dances, lost in fear,
Unsure if his love’s truly near.
üñ§
With every touch, she seeks a sign,
In whispered words, a tangled line.
Does he love her? She can’t decode,
In toxic webs, their hearts erode.
üò∞
Yet still she stays, in hope’s embrace,
Caught in love’s elusive chase.
In shadows deep, her heart entwined,

items.title: UNCHANGING SIGHTS - A POEM
items.summary:
Made the wrong choice, Hell is the repitition,
Hoping for new scenes, but I see same sights.
Unchanging landscape, never the surprise,
Always the same, but never quite right

items.title: REFLECTIONS OF LOVE - A POEM
items.summary:
In the mirror‚Äôs gaze, find strength untold,
Embrace the flaws, let self-love unfold.
A dance with echoes of kindness within,
Cherish the soul, let self-love begin.
Through trials and triumphs, be your guide,
In the heart‚Äôs cathedral, let love reside.
Each flaw a note in the melody of you,
Compose a symphony, authentic and true.
Like petals unfolding in morning light,
Discover self-love, a radiant sight.
No need for judgment, let acceptance bloom,

items.title: I CAN'T BREATHE - A Poem
items.summary:
In shadows cast by prejudice, a tale unfolds,
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt breathe,‚Äù the whispered plea, truth be told.
A world divided by the hues we wear,
Yet, in unity, a remedy lies somewhere.
Echoes of injustice linger in the air,
As wounds of hatred fester, deep and bare.
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt breathe,‚Äù a refrain of human pain,
Yearning for a day when love shall reign.
Skin is but a canvas, painted diverse,
